    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Patient
    HospitalQueue.treatPatient()
    Treats (removes) the patient with the highest severity from the queue.
    Patient
    DischargeManager.undoDischarge()
    Undoes the last discharge by popping the most recently discharged patient from the stack and returning it.

    Method
    Description
    void
    HospitalQueue.addPatient(Patient patient)
    Adds a patient to the hospital queue.
    void
    PatientManager.addPatient(Patient patient)
    Adds a new patient to the patient records list and saves the list to the file.
    void
    DischargeManager.dischargePatient(Patient patient)
    Discharges a patient by pushing them onto the discharged stack.
    void
    PatientManager.removePatient(Patient patient)
    Removes a patient from the patient records list and saves the updated list to the file.
